mapper.select: select s.id, s.user_name, s.duty, s.trip_mode_id, tm.name as trip_mode_name, s.status, s.depart_time from schedule s left join trip_mode tm on tm.id = s.trip_mode_id
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(user_name, duty, trip_mode_id, status, depart_time) values(#{user_name}, #{duty}, #{trip_mode_id}, #{status}, #{depart_time})
mapper.update: update schedule set user_name=#{user_name}, duty=#{duty}, trip_mode_id=#{trip_mode_id}, status=#{status}, depart_time=#{depart_time} where id=#{id}
update schedule set status = #{cancelStatus} where id = #{id}
